class.name: BasicItemKit
class.description: A [BulletKit](https://github.com/PickledCow/STGodot-4/wiki/BulletKit) for general purpose items. BasicItemKits add parameters for common behaviour of items such as their fall speed and speed at which items move towards the player when collected.

members.member: How much the initial speed of the item decreases per tick.
Velocity vector of the item's movement after the scatter animation in pixels per tick.
The speed at which items move towards the player when collected in pixels per tick.
